titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: The weather has become strangely warm, with wind & (as it fell) wet. I attended Mattins:
: attended Evensong: wrote letters: arranged (more or less) my impossible tables: and finally made a show of reading Italian with Ella who was intermittently asleep! What a record!
